text:
e="preserve">Bowie is a city in Prince George's County, Maryland. The population was 54,727 at the 2010 U.S. Census. It is the largest city in Prince George's County, and the fifth most populous city and third largest city by area in the U.S. state of Maryland.
In 2014, CNN ranked Bowie 28th in its Best Places to Live in America list.
